Title: Bachelor/ette Party
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Carly Hallam
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: Charles plans a scavenger hunt for Jake's bachelor party; Amy's bachelorette party escalates when it's discovered she once slept with a member of her soon-to-be wedding band.
